abort.reconfigure_successful:
**Re-configuration was successful**

Go to webhooks in the Locative app and update webhook with the following settings:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

create_entry.default:
To send locations to Home Assistant, you will need to set up the webhook feature in the Locative app.

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

reconfigure.description: Do you want to start re-configuration?
reconfigure.title: Re-configure Locative webhook
